climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: 🏆 The Original Award-Winning Acne Patch: Mighty Patch is a hydrocolloid sticker that improves the look of pimples overnight without the popping. Just stick it on, get some sleep, and wake up with clearer-looking skin.
⏱️ Results in 6-8 Hours: Absorbs pimple gunk thanks to our medical-grade hydrocolloid. Clinically tested, drug-free, and safe for all skin types.
🛌 All-Night Adhesion: Strong enough to stay on through a whole night of tossing, turning, and pillow-squishing. Easy to remove in the AM without redness or irritation.
✨ Blends Seamlessly into Skin: The thin sticker with a translucent matte finish keeps your pimple under wraps day or night. You might just forget you’re even wearing it.

🕊️ Peace-Of-Mind Design: Our hydrocolloid patches are UV sterilized, and allergy tested. Each box comes with 26 total patches – 12 Mighty Patch Original, 12 Mighty Patch Invisible+ and 2 Mighty Patch Surface.
body.description: Got a pimple emergency? Meet Mighty Patch: the gentler way to handle pimples and blemishes overnight. Each patch gently absorbs pimple gunk so your zit looks better in just 1-2 patches. No picking, no popping. Why Mighty Patch? Mighty Patch gets visible results fast – without drying or irritating your skin. Made of 100% pure medical-grade hydrocolloid, a fluid-absorbing gel, to absorb pimple gunk and protect your pimple while it’s healing. How does Mighty Patch work? Put Mighty Patch on a clean whitehead (the “poppable” kind of pimple) and leave it on overnight for best results. Wake up to see the sticker white with absorbed pimple gunk. These small (but mighty) stickers trap the pus and fluids from your pimple like a pro. What pimples does it work best on? Mighty Patch works best on pimples with fluid or pus inside. Usually that means whiteheads that have come to a head. With cystic acne, we recommend you see a doctor or dermatologist. It does not work on blackheads.Our Mighty Patch acne patches are: - Clinically tested, drug-free, and non-drying. 100% safe and dermatologist reviewed - never tested on animals and vegan friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I didn’t think they’d work
reviews.reviewText: Omg they worked so good for me!. I got 2 nasty ingrown zits on my cheek and didn’t want to touch them. I did some research and ran across these! The first night I put them on it made a huge difference! Some how it sucks the puss out your skin! Amazing! I keep them on for long as I could which is 8 hours! Will definitely buy again if needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for those STUBBORN Zits!
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for white heads and black heads and zits. I love the way these suck everything outta my face!! I wear them to bed or even to work bc I am a confident queen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy these not other brands
reviews.reviewText: I have tried other brands. These are the best. They do the trick and don’t dry out surrounding skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are good! Convenient. I wish there were more of the large rectangular ones. But that’s on me to be those individually. I love that there’s so many, I thought I would run through these like crazy but I’ve made them last awhile

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as good
reviews.reviewText: These used to be my go to patches for outbreaks but the passed few times they just haven't worked as well. Minimal junk pulled out of my skin followed immediately with another brands patch and tons more pulled out. Kinda bummed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A really good variety mix, thnaks to this pack, I could try invisible and surface patches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Love These!
reviews.reviewText: I can't believe I never tried this value pack before! Normally I buy the invisible blue package but I like this package a lot more. Definitely will be repurchasing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These lime patches are little heros! Put them on a pimple before bed and wake up to a much smaller if not eliminated pimple.ni highly recommend them.
